basics.name: Sienne Rodwell
basics.label: Computer Science Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2024.

work.summary: Research and Presentation in Modern Cybersecurity Issues
highlights: Identified and analyzed issues in current Cyber operations in the Navy and DoD
Researched improvements and developments in Cyber operations and Big Data sharing
Created deliverables (research paper and presentation) according to superiorâ€™s intent
Presented findings of research, accommodating for audience, including representative Ed Case and senator Mazie Hirono
